info.name: onRelease() click and dragRadius
info.description:
left click creates a blue circle of [clickRadius]

Whle holding down left mouse outside the blue circle, it counts as a Drag (green circle gets filled)

If you release the mouse button inside the blue circle, it counts as a onClick (orange circle fills)
